typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "The sender has to be the controller, governance, or vault"

arguments.value: The sender has to be the controller, governance, or vault

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "The sender has to be the controller, governance, or vault"

nodes.documentation: Uses the Curve protocol to convert the wbtc asset into to mixed renwbtc token.
nodes.name: mixFromWBTC

nodes.documentation:
Uses the Curve protocol to convert the mixed token back into the wbtc asset. If it cannot
acquire the limit amount, it will acquire the maximum it can.
nodes.name: mixToWBTC

nodes.documentation:
Withdraws an wbtc asset from the strategy to the vault in the specified amount by asking
by removing imbalanced liquidity from the Curve protocol. The rest is deposited back to the
Curve protocol pool. If the amount requested cannot be obtained, the method will get as much
as we have.
nodes.name: withdrawToVault

nodes.documentation: Withdraws all assets from the vault.
nodes.name: withdrawAllToVault

nodes.documentation: Invests all wbtc assets into our mixToken vault.
nodes.name: investAllUnderlying

nodes.documentation:
The hard work only invests all wbtc assets, and then tells the controller to call hard
work on the mixToken vault.
nodes.name: doHardWork

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "token is defined as not salvageable"

arguments.value: token is defined as not salvageable

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "token is defined as not salvageable"

nodes.documentation: Salvages a token. We cannot salvage mixToken tokens, CRV, or wbtc assets.
nodes.name: salvage

nodes.documentation:
Returns the wbtc invested balance. The is the wbtc amount in this stragey, plus the gauge
amount of the mixed token converted back to wbtc.
nodes.name: investedUnderlyingBalance

nodes.documentation: Wraps the coin amount in the array for interacting with the Curve protocol
nodes.name: wrapCoinAmount

nodes.documentation: Claims the CRV crop, converts it to WBTC/renWBTC on Uniswap
nodes.name: claimAndLiquidateCrv

nodes.documentation:
Can completely disable claiming CRV rewards and selling. Good for emergency withdraw in the
simplest possible way.
nodes.name: setSell

nodes.documentation: Sets the minimum amount of CRV needed to trigger a sale.
nodes.name: setSellFloor

doHardWork().notice: The hard work only invests all wbtc assets, and then tells the controller to call hard work on the mixToken vault.

investedUnderlyingBalance().notice: Returns the wbtc invested balance. The is the wbtc amount in this stragey, plus the gauge amount of the mixed token converted back to wbtc.

salvage(address,address,uint256).notice: Salvages a token. We cannot salvage mixToken tokens, CRV, or wbtc assets.

setSell(bool).notice: Can completely disable claiming CRV rewards and selling. Good for emergency withdraw in the simplest possible way.

setSellFloor(uint256).notice: Sets the minimum amount of CRV needed to trigger a sale.

withdrawAllToVault().notice: Withdraws all assets from the vault.

withdrawToVault(uint256).notice: Withdraws an wbtc asset from the strategy to the vault in the specified amount by asking by removing imbalanced liquidity from the Curve protocol. The rest is deposited back to the Curve protocol pool. If the amount requested cannot be obtained, the method will get as much as we have.
